title: Unspecified Error 6.24
body:
Okay so Basically whenever i open up my client it gives the "Update Failed, Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more info", this is really frustrating me as i have tried all the recommendations. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the patcher twice but the message keeps on popping up, the servers are all good but I cant even press any buttons on the client. I really need someone to help me.
Thanks

PS I can send a ticket cause my email change before i verified.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Revelstoke,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=AOefAytp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-10T04:04:17.531+0000)
>
> Yeah same thing, fixed it by changing my DNS to 8.8.8.8,
> however game crashed at first load-in and would not reconnect.
> 
> Now the client's detected possible corruption and is downloading 4gb of patches.
> 
> Hurray! 3 Hours!

 Basically thank you this guy change ur DNS to 8888 if u dont know how 2 do that just google dns change and ur all good
